name: Space Ranger (TriniGameDev)
description:
Battle the Boss that never dies. Each time it's killed it will return even stronger!

How to Play: Use WASD or Arrow Keys to Move. Tap "Space" to shoot.

Assets: https://kenney.itch.io/ship-mixer & https://kenney.nl/assets/pixel-shmup

Source code: https://github.com/CoryDS79/GDTV-GameJam-2022.git
